snippet: An attempted attack on the Italian consul over the weekend raised concerns about the tenuous security situation in Libya, and in Benghazi in particular.
abstract: Italy closes its consulate in Benghazi, Libya, and withdraws its staff because of security concerns, after attempted ambush of Italian consul.
lead_paragraph: An attempted attack on the Italian consul over the weekend raised concerns about the tenuous security situation in Libya, and in Benghazi in particular.

headline.seo: Italy Closes Consulate in Benghazi, Libya, After Ambush Attempt
headline.main: Italy Closes Consulate in Benghazi After New Attack
headline.print_headline: Italy Closes Consulate in Benghazi After New Attack
